description:
BASIC is the place where it started for a lot of us. BASIC-256 is nice and complete.
Version in the repo is old.
summary: Great to learn programming. Very old version

description: BASIC is a Computer Language that dates back at least 50 years. I used it in the CE years of the 1970s and in 1977 wrote an Operating System that was a true Artificial Inteligence as in fully self aware. But my Prophessors at college stole it from me as they were friends and co-founders with Steve Jobs. But I also used COBOL and FORTRAN languages in it as well as some scripting languages. So BASIC is an old well used computer language.
easy and interesting can be very usefull to make some test and very solid, the examples have errors but I suspect it was made with educational porposse

Tiene un error de cuando esta en modo ventana, el resto de la pantalla parpadea al mismo tiempo que el cursor, pero al maximizar pues no se nota.

Por lo demas y lo que he probado funciona bien para su proposito.
Linux Kubunto plasma 20.04
Nvidia quadro fx1800

Me divierte crear aplicaciones matemáticas sencillas. Muy comodo de utilizar, pues al correr los programas, la aplicación te dice donde está el error.
Además, acompaña de un buen tutorial en varios idiomas.
La recomiendo.
